perturbation.original_text: This Transportation Service Agreement (Agreement) is entered into by Great Lakes Gas Transmission Limited Partnership (Transporter) and ANR PIPELINE COMPANY (Shipper).
perturbation.changed_text: This Transportation Service Agreement (Agreement) is entered into by Great Lakes Gas Transmission Limited Partnership (Transporter) and ANR PIPELINE COMPANY (Customer).
perturbation.explanation: The contract initially defines ANR PIPELINE COMPANY as 'Shipper.' By changing this to 'Customer' in the introduction, without defining Customer, creates confusion as to whether these terms are interchangeable or if they have different obligations throughout the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: Unless Shipper and Transporter have agreed to a rate other than the maximum rate, rates shall be Transporter's maximum rates and charges plus all applicable surcharges in effect from time to time under the applicable Rate Schedule (as stated above) on file with the Commission unless otherwise agreed to by the parties in writing. Provisions governing a Rate other than the maximum shall be set forth in this Paragraph 9 and/or on Appendix B hereto.
perturbation.changed_text: Unless Customer and Transporter have agreed to a rate other than the maximum rate, rates shall be Transporter's maximum rates and charges plus all applicable surcharges in effect from time to time under the applicable Rate Schedule (as stated above) on file with the Commission unless otherwise agreed to by the parties in writing. Provisions governing a Rate other than the maximum shall be set forth in this Paragraph 9 and/or on Appendix B hereto.
perturbation.explanation: This perturbation further uses the term 'Customer' instead of 'Shipper'. Since these terms are used interchangeably it is unclear what entity is actually bound to the terms of the agreement. This creates uncertainty and potential dispute over the agreed upon rates.

perturbation.original_text: Upon termination of this Agreement, Shipper's and Transporter's obligations to each other arising under this Agreement, prior to the date of termination, remain in effect and are not being terminated by any provision of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Upon termination of this Agreement, Client's and Transporter's obligations to each other arising under this Agreement, prior to the date of termination, remain in effect and are not being terminated by any provision of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By introducing 'Client' in place of 'Shipper,' the contract further muddies the waters. It is now unclear if Shipper, Customer, and Client are the same entity, and who is actually subject to the obligations after termination of the agreement. This contradiction impacts the enforceability of post-termination obligations.
